channel.title: AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)
channel.description: Recent content in AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)

item.title: Group
item.description: Open Positions I am hiring Ph.D. students (full scholarship) and visiting students (CSC or self-funded) regarding the following research topics: Embodied AI: perception and action models for robotics Multimodal AI: large models (VLM/VLA) for robotics TinyML: edge AI models for robotics The candidates are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning, deep learning or embodied AI. Please drop an email to me with the title “PhD Application + [Name]”.
